name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_2_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I’m walking, I deliberately notice the sensations of my body moving.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_3_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I’m good at finding words to describe my feelings.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_4_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I criticize myself for having irrational or inappropriate emotions.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_5_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I perceive my feelings and emotions without having to react to them.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_6_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I do things, my mind wanders off and I’m easily distracted.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_7_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I take a shower or bath, I stay alert to the sensations of water on my body.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_8_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I can easily put my beliefs, opinions, and expectations into words.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_9_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I don’t pay attention to what I’m doing because I’m daydreaming, worrying, or otherwise distracted.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_10_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I watch my feelings without getting lost in them.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_11_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I tell myself I shouldn’t be feeling the way I’m feeling.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_12_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I notice how foods and drinks affect my thoughts, bodily sensations, and emotions.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_13_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: It’s hard for me to find the words to describe what I’m thinking.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_14_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I am easily distracted.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_15_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I believe some of my thoughts are abnormal or bad and I shouldn’t think that way.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_16_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I pay attention to sensations, such as the wind in my hair or sun on my face.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_17_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I have trouble thinking of the right words to express how I feel about things.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_18_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I make judgments about whether my thoughts are good or bad.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_19_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I find it difficult to stay focused on what’s happening in the present.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_20_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I have distressing thoughts or images, I “step back” and am aware of the thought or image without getting taken over by it.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_21_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I pay attention to sounds, such as clocks ticking, birds chirping, or cars passing.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_22_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: In difficult situations, I can pause without immediately reacting.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_23_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I have a sensation in my body, it’s difficult for me to describe it because I can’t find the right words.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_24_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: It seems I am “running on automatic” without much awareness of what I’m doing.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_25_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I have distressing thoughts or images, I feel calm soon after.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_26_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I tell myself that I shouldn’t be thinking the way I’m thinking.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_27_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I notice the smells and aromas of things.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_28_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: Even when I’m feeling terribly upset, I can find a way to put it into words.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_29_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I rush through activities without being really attentive to them.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_30_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I have distressing thoughts or images I am able just to notice them without reacting.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_31_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I think some of my emotions are bad or inappropriate and I shouldn’t feel them.

options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I notice visual elements in art or nature, such as colors, shapes, textures, or patterns of light and shadow.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_33_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: My natural tendency is to put my experiences into words.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_34_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I have distressing thoughts or images, I just notice them and let them go.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_35_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I do jobs or tasks automatically without being aware of what I’m doing.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_36_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: When I have distressing thoughts or images, I judge myself as good or bad, depending what the thought/image is about.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_37_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I pay attention to how my emotions affect my thoughts and behavior.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_38_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I can usually describe how I feel at the moment in considerable detail.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_39_options
options: never or very rarely true|rarely true|sometimes true|often true|very often or always true
text: I find myself doing things without paying attention.

name: five_facet_mindfulness_survey_40_options
